subject: Re: Antwort: Re: [junit] How exclude tests from being executed at the same time
msgSnippet: ... What do you mean by in another way ? Can t Maven run two different test suites in different VMs for the same project??? Curious, Ilja
messageBody:
herbert.helmstreit@... schrieb:
> Hi Ilja,
>
> Thank you for your response. It is JUnit 3.8.1 as a Maven 1.X Plugin.
> We are trying to split the tests off from the suite and execute them in
> another way.

What do you mean by "in another way"? Can't Maven run two different test
suites in different VMs for the same project???

Curious, Ilja
